stepTitle: Which of the colors of visible light has enough energy to eject electrons from this metal? The formula for relating frequency and wavelength is $$𝑐=𝜆𝜈$$ where c is the speed of light (2.998×10**8 m/s) 𝜆 is the wavelength, and 𝜈 is the frequency. $$1nm=$$ $$1{X10}^{-9} m$$. (Please refer to the electromagnetic radiation diagram posted in lecture slides for wavelength and color correlation)
